title: Wraith's Awakening
description: Don't miss out on National Bestselling Author Virna DePaul's intriguing Para-Ops world! Overview of Wraith's Awakening:A naked female wakes up in an alley with no memory of her human life. Her blue-tinged skin, white hair, and hazy eyes exude "walking dead," and several individuals, including a sophisticated vampire named Colt, claim she's a ghost. Meet Wraith and witness her awakening.
author: Virna DePaul
